flawed_nl_solution:
Tyler gives away 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7.0>>7.0 CDs
After giving away a third of his CDs, Tyler has 21 - 7.0 = <<21-7.0=14.0>>14.0 CDs
After buying new CDs, Tyler has 14.0 + 8 = <<14.0+8=25.0>>25.0 CDs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22.0, not 25.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
